sqlMap.select: select dom.id, dom.address, dom.zip, provexreg.code as country, citiesexreg.code as city, countryexreg.code as pais, dom.city as cityName, dom.country as countryName, dom.pais as paisName from scr_dom dom, scr_prov prov, scr_provexreg provexreg, scr_cities cities, scr_citiesexreg citiesexreg, scr_country country, scr_countryexreg countryexreg where dom.id=#id# and provexreg.id_prov=prov.id and prov.name=dom.country and citiesexreg.id_city=cities.id and cities.name=dom.city and countryexreg.id_country=country.id and dom.pais=country.name

select dom.id, dom.address, dom.zip, countryexreg.code as pais, dom.city as cityName, dom.country as countryName, dom.pais as paisName, '' as city, '' as country from scr_dom dom, scr_country country, scr_countryexreg countryexreg where dom.id=#id# and countryexreg.id_country=country.id and dom.pais=country.name
